newsitem.title: USA: Toastmaster expects 10 to 30 pct cost savings.
newsitem.headline: Toastmaster expects 10 to 30 pct cost savings.

text.p: Toastmaster Inc said it is in the process of implementing a previously announced restructuring of its product lines and operations, a move it expects will result in unit cost savings ranging from 10 to 30 percent.

The manufacturer said some of its kitchen countertop appliances could be made more price competitive by terminating their production at the company-owned plant in Boonville, Mo., and sourcing them from lower-cost vendors.
Earlier Wednesday, Toastmaster reported a first-quarter loss of $0.15 per share, compared to a year-ago loss of $0.22 per share in the same period.
